a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (22:25): is confused by the HTML XML use cases
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (22:25): How can "Using an XML toolchain to consume HTML" and "Forgiving error-handling with XHTML-style markup" ever coexist?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (22:26): By improving the XML toolchain?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (22:27): But yes, not everything is possible.
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (22:27): It seems to me that any XML toolchain that's capable of consuming non-XML probably doesn't need HTML XML
